column1: Uchi////Everything about this place is my favorite
column2: they are serious about good fun food
column3: it is expensive but it's worth every bit. Walu walu may be my most favorite thing in Houston. Go Friday and wait in the line
column4: not many places do ppl que for in Houston but this is by far worth it
column5: happy hour prices rock too. The icing on the cake is biggler
column6: head chef - guy is just the
